title: Studies and Sociologists to use for the Crime & Deviance topic (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Matthew talks through some key studies that are useful for the Crime and Deviance topic on issues such as masculinity, green crime, ethnicity, cyber crime and increasing female crime.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew talks through some key studies that are useful for the Crime and Deviance topic on issues such as masculinity, green crime, ethnicity, cyber crime and increasing female crime.
